SEARCH
Module org.tquadrat.foundation.xml

Package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal

@API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.1.0") package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal
The internal classes for the implementation of the XML builder tools.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder
    Classes for builder XML elements and documents.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi
    Several classes that are not part of the API for the XML builder tools, but required to implement tools for other, XML-derived languages, like SVG or HTML.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Comment
    This class defines a SGML comment.
    DocType
    The definition for the XML DocType element.
    ProcessingInstructionImpl
    The implementation for the interface ProcessingInstruction.
    Text
    This class defines the plain text that is the content of an SGML element as such an element.
    XMLDocumentImpl
    The implementation for the interface XMLDocument.

    It allows document comments and processing instructions to be added.
    XMLElementImpl
    An implementation of XMLElement that supports attributes, namespaces, children, text, CDATA and comments.
